text:

creator: prashant.deva@gmail.com

text:
Applied after some hand edits (svn #481878). For the future please:

- submit patches in the form of a patch (svn diff), never a complete copy of the
file

- prepend "[PATCH] " to Bugzilla subject

- do not reformat unrelated existing text

- respect the formatting (and, here, alphabetization) of the existing document
when inserting new text
creator: jglick@apache.org
prashant.deva@gmail.com
